EmailTemplate.name: 201812_Global_Email_SupplierSurvey_mih.201812_Global_Email_SupplierSurvey_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: We Want Your Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK PAUL EBERTZ | CHIEF PROCUREMENT OFFICER, HONEYWELL AEROSPACE
Dear Supplier,
We want to know what’s working and what’s not. If you haven’t already, let us know.
We’ll follow up with what we’ve heard and let you know what we’re going to do about it.
TELL US NOW <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/MWLJB5W]]>
Thank you!
Paul
If the survey link above does not work, copy and paste the URL below into your internet browser: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/MWLJB5W <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/MWLJB5W]]>
